title: Comcast Corporation
description: The brand colors of Comcast Corporation include a vibrant palette featuring warm tones of yellow (#FFBA00) and orange (#F56F02), complemented by a bold red (#CB1F47), and softened by shades of blue (#0088D2) and green (#00B345). These colors, along with the inclusion of a refined violet (#645DAC), reflect the company's energetic and modern identity, as outlined in the brand guidelines available on platforms like Behance.
